Change.Before: 40/50/60/70/80 (+20-30 (based on level)) (+35% AP) (+ 3.1% Stardust) percent of target maximum health
Change.After: 60/70/80/90/100 (+35% AP) (+ 3.1% Stardust) percent of target maximum health

Change.Before: 60/90/120% (+ (81.25% Critical Strike Chance) * (100% Critical Strike Damage)
Change.After: 60/90/120% (+ (85% Critical Strike Chance) * (100% Critical Strike Damage)

Change.Attribute: Bonus Damage from Critical Strike Chance:
Bonus Magic Damage to Marked Targets:

Change.After: 144/216/288/360/432 (+135% AP) (Note: Including the damage upon rooting an enemy, this totals to 164/246/328/411/492 (+215% AP))

Change.Before: 4.5% maximum health true damage per 100 AD
Change.After: 4% maximum health true damage per 100 AD
Now applies against turrets and other structures, dealing 50% normal damage.
now applies damage in an AoE when targeting structures and includes them in its AoE when targeting units nearby.

Casting Realm of Death will now reveal the target upon starting the cast. This means that walking into a brush while Mordekaiser is casting his R will no longer cancel the spell. NoteThe target will not be revealed for the entire duration of the spell, so you can still hide on bush if one comes with you to the Realm.

R.SpellName: R - Call of the Forge God

Change.Before: 6-48 (based on level) (+2% AP per 100 bonus health) (+5% of his bonus health)
Change.After: 6-48 (based on level) (+2% AP per 100 bonus health) (+4% of his bonus health)
Critical strikes now roll an additional 6 sided die that is weighted towards 1 rather than 6.
0.575 critical strike multiplier added (increases damage by up to 57.5% based on critical strike chance)
0.350 critical strike multiplier added (increases damage by up to 35% based on critical strike chance)
0.250 critical strike multiplier added (increases damage by up to 25% based on critical strike chance)
Locking in a card now resets Twisted Fate’s auto attack timer
Pick a Card now affects Inhibitors and the Nexus
Stacked Deck now affects towers at 50% effectiveness
TF’s deck now becomes fully stacked on spawn

Change.Attribute: Bonus Physical Damage on Next Attack:

Change.Before: 10-20% Heal and Shield Power (based on ally level)

Change.After: Shaco’s clone will now attack the nearest visible enemy champion within 1500 range of it when dead.
Shaco’s clone will now stop to cast the fake W and will only do so within 300 units of Shaco prime.
Shaco clone will stop to cast a fake E and will only do so within 575 units of Shaco prime’s E target, this also fakes a missile.
Rhaast’s R now heals even if the unit dies during the channel.

Change.Before: 3.5/4.25/5/5.75/6.5% (+ 1% per 100 AP) of target maximum health
Change.After: 3/3.75/4.5/5.25/6% (+ 1% per 100 AP) of target maximum health

Change.Attribute: You Can Run, But You Can’t Hide:
Change.After: Kalista’s basic attacks no longer miss if a target leaves vision.

Change.Attribute: Health Regeneration per 5% of Missing Health:

Change.After: now apply to structures at 50% damage.
40/70/100/130/160 (+70% AP) (+3.5% of target's maximum health) (Note: Maximum damage values are still 2x the minimum damage values.)
now apply to structures at 50% damage.
Draven R now returns to his body after striking a champion while he's dead.

Change.Before: All takedowns, epic monster kills, and structures destroyed grant Get Excited! stacks and refresh the buff
Change.After: Epic monster kills and destroying structures will grant the first stack of Get Excited! and will refresh the buff, but only champion takedowns can increase the amount of stacks Jinx can get
Jinx can now only get 5 stacks of Get Excited!
No longer removes Grievous Wounds from targets
Caretaker’s Shrine now accumulates charges over time up to a maximum of 2 charges.

Change.Attribute: Shrine Charge Time to Full Heal:
Healing based on Missing Health per Target:
Change.Before: 13% per target (up to a maximum of 39%)
Change.After: 15% per target (up to a maximum of 45%)

Change.After: 80/100/120/140/160 (+80% bonus AD) (+5% (+0.5% per Mark Mark) target’s missing health)
Now uses both attack animations equally instead of 75/25%
When cast at range, Q will now reset Talon's attack timer. (Note: this has been updated to match the functionality of his Q when cast at melee range.)
Now grants +2.5 cast range per stack, maximum +25 range at 10 stacks.

Q.SpellName: Q - Bear Trap on a Rope

Change.After: No longer variable duration, changing from 1.75-2 seconds to 1.75 flat.
Now ghosts units during the cast.
550 range, edge to edge (Note: this should make W better against large targets while being neutral against smaller targets.)

Change.Attribute: Maximum Health Damage per Stack per 100 AP:

Change.After: Maiden of the Mist will now regenerate 2.5 health per second
400-1950 (levels 6-18, nonlinear scaling) (+60% of Yorick’s maximum health)

70-150 (based on level) (Note: This is up to 40% more damage at level 1 against monsters with over 1328 HP, tapering to 0% more at less than 949 HP. Raptor has 1100, while Red, Blue, Gromp, Krug, and Wolf all hit the new max HP cap.)

Burn damage now counts as Milio's damage even when applied through allies, allowing it to interact with a select number of items like Hextech Putrifier. Burn damage will still grant the ally who applied the debuff the kill, preventing Milio from accidentally kill stealing confirming kills.
0.4% (+0.025% per 100 bonus health) per 1% missing health
0.5 seconds (Note: Total bleed damage and duration are unchanged.)
Q now applies on-hit effects and lifesteal
